trans-unit.source: <ph conref="../conrefs.dita#prod/productshortname"></ph> provides a tool to monitor and display locking information.

seg-source.mrk: <ph conref="../conrefs.dita#prod/productshortname"></ph> provides a tool to monitor and display locking information.

target.mrk: <ph conref="../conrefs.dita#prod/productshortname"></ph> provides a tool to monitor and display locking information.

trans-unit.source: This tool can help you create applications that minimize deadlock. It can also help you locate the cause of deadlock when it does occur.

seg-source.mrk: This tool can help you create applications that minimize deadlock.
It can also help you locate the cause of deadlock when it does occur.

target.mrk: This tool can help you create applications that minimize deadlock.
It can also help you locate the cause of deadlock when it does occur.

trans-unit.source: To diagnose locking problems, constantly monitor locking traffic by logging all deadlocks by using the <codeph>derby.locks.monitor</codeph> property, which is described in the <ph conref="../conrefs.dita#pub/citref"></ph>.

seg-source.mrk: To diagnose locking problems, constantly monitor locking traffic by logging all deadlocks by using the <codeph>derby.locks.monitor</codeph> property, which is described in the <ph conref="../conrefs.dita#pub/citref"></ph>.

target.mrk: To diagnose locking problems, constantly monitor locking traffic by logging all deadlocks by using the <codeph>derby.locks.monitor</codeph> property, which is described in the <ph conref="../conrefs.dita#pub/citref"></ph>.
